name: FROGY SLIME
description: Hop into the action with "FROGY SLIME" a fun and challenging platformer game where you play as small slime looking for frogs, venturing deep into a mysterious cave. Today, on World Frog Day, it's up to you to guide yourself through the treacherous terrain, avoiding obstacles, and unlocking new levels along the way. With simple controls and cute graphics, FROGY SLIME is the perfect way to celebrate these amazing amphibians!
